mapper.sql: id AS id, parent_id AS parentId , ipss_title AS ipssTitle , ipss_score AS ipssScore, ipss_type AS ipssType, ipss_weight AS ipssWeight, order_weight AS orderWeight, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime , delete_user AS deleteUser, delete_time AS deleteTime, del_flag AS delFlag
mapper.select: select from base_ipss where id = #{value} AND del_flag='0'
